SUCH A GOOD GAME its amazing to play alone with killer or maybe survivor, solo Q's sometimes annoying, or with friends playing survivor(SWF) or maybe a custom game(KYF). I would recommend and do not stealth or use locker much maybe not ever at all and if you want to get better watch otzdarva he makes really good fun content and has lots of tip and tricks as well. You should get it!!!

The first part was written originally after more than 70 hours playing as killer getting baited by  trolls and playing their game as toxic as they are with no pleasure but frustation while playing.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
this game could be extremley nice but there are 90% toxic players who just want to nag as possible the killer to show how extremly skills they are (even against noob killer). They insult you everytime in the chat when you do things negative like 1 gen camping to secure last kill or even playing as nice as possible without camping. 

Most survivors doesn't give a damn about the game they just want you, killer, to waste your time by everytime trolling you when they know that they are safe and the gate are open and you are at the total opposite of the map. and destroy your fun by gaming. They also spam control( to crounch) near you just to provoke you in a duel without giving a damn by the main objective,  fixing the gens.

They will use infinite loop that they have found on youtube to troll you as possible, making explosion by faking it just to troll you and telling you they are there of course without giving a damn about gens.

Moreover, there are way too much smurf  especially as survivors that with more than 1000 hours  gameplay enjoy insulting and provoking killer with 50h max. I think that those people can't play against good player so they prefer to easily beat noob killer and destroy the whole game.

Most toxic community ever avoid that community and that game at all cost
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
18th January 2021 update
I still maintain what is writing above (However I have changed my mind about the last line) but that's not a reason to not recommend the game.

If you are new, especially if you are more interested to play as a killer, it's going to be tough but the game is really fun when played correctly and with the correct person (same skills)

As mention in the first part of the review, I got really frustrated by so many people t bagging (spamming control  key) when the stun you or loop you forever. Same for 4 SWF(survivors with friends) who don't care about gens and hide the entire game into an house inside lockers to stun you every time you ll try to hit them or SWF wearing all a flashlight to troll you as possible or body block you with 3 persons so you will never reach the hook.

But that's not the entire community and to be honest most of the time you ll get baited by the troll you are just feeding them and being yourself a troll by using toxicity as an answer and wasting the time of other survivors who want to have fun.

That's why I need to apologize for some bad behaviour made during that first part of gaming and swears after game chat when I got really mad and also to treat almost the whole community as "toxic". Doing this, won't do  anything good to the game's reputation.

My advice as a killer:

If you see a troll that doesn't care about doing gens and making the game go forward, just ignore him. I don't even try to hit them or trying to chase them if they are useless in the game and for other survivors.

Never face camp by guilty or trying to humiliate survivors by letting them die slowly.

Avoid as possible camping. When I have a down, I just put him or her in the nearest hook and will go to gens and look after my the next chase. Waiting in front of the hook after your first down is dumb and will let all the time required to survivors to finish fixing gens. However, if you see scratches near your hook don't go away there is someone near trying to rescue him or her.

When I know people are already "sitting" next to the open door waiting for me to go for them, if it's too far away and I know the game is over, I just press "windows" and stay afk in the game while doing something useful on my computer.

Don't try to chase someone forever by frustration or by only objective to catch him or her.
It's not productive, they are so many survivors with 1000h and more  that  can easily loop your for ages. Sure you will finally be able to catch him but you will waste time and let survivors doing gens without pressure. At the end nobody win and survivors will get bored and won't enjoy the game and you will loose without having fun.

If you begin to get mad, just wait until the game is over and don't use chat for spreading your frustration and anger. Just quit the game, do something else, remember it's just a game. 

I would also highly recommend to watch videos to understand how to "counter" looping survivors as a killer (I am still not able to do it  but I am learning it :))

To conclude, I recommend that game but  you will need to be aware that if you want to have fun, you ll need to respect each other and never focus on toxicity and troll. Just play fair without having the objective to kill everyone at all cost by face camping the whole game.

See you on the game.
Have fun

Ein wirklich schönes Spiel zum zwischendurch und mit Freunden spielen!
Das Spiel zeigt genug Varianz durch viele verschiedene Killer mit unterschiedlichen Fähigkeiten, eine lange lange Palette an Perks sowohl für Survivor, als auch für Killer, vielen unterschiedlichen Maps, deren Aufbau und Gestaltung gut gewählt und schön gestaltet wurden, und vielen unterschiedlichen Items und Zusätze, die man mitnehmen kann, um das Spiel ein wenig abwechslungsreicher zu machen.
Um es durchgehend spielen zu können fehlt mir zwar die Varianz und Komplexität im Spiel, aber habe mittlerweile um die 200 Spielstunden in diesem Spiel, und die haben sehr viel Spaß gemacht :3

this game is a fu cking piece of shi t. i hate this goddamn stupid game. this game is full of fucking bugs, every single update the devs put out fixing 1000 bugs, they break 1000 other things and add 1000 other bugs, killer hitboxes are the most bugged and broken thing in the game, they hit you a mile across the map, hits that shouldnt have hit keep hitting, spirit still isnt nerfed and she's a monstrosity, trapper still isnt buffed properly, The Twins are an unbalanced OP mess, killer projectiles literally go through walls (huntress hatchets, deathslinger), killers literally VPN to get better ping and screws over us survivors because shit happens that shouldnt be happening, survivors can be toxic as well, but that's because they're traumatized from killers being toxic (slugging, camping, tunneling, NOED), the devs never release survivors with good perks (Elodie's perks were TRASH, all 3, usually devs release a survivor with ONE good perk), usually they release killers with trash perks as well, perk meta never changes, devs don't update outdated perks to change the meta, and overall this game is just garbage

so anyways i play this game everyday and i have 1k+ hours on it

Yeah, I enjoy the game, but none of the game's biggest problems are ever addressed. I've followed this game for years before starting to *really* get into it, and the problems from 18 months ago are more or less just as bad. Any killer that has a fun gimmick gets nerfed into the floor. Everything that's fun gets nerfed into the floor. I play killer more than survivor, but I know survivors have their own gripes with the game and it can be really frustrating for both sides. I recommend it if you can adapt to the janky balance, but matching with experienced players is a nightmare until you do.

My friends play this game on switch and around the time of the Christmas sales they said i should get it, so i did. At first i was a little freaked out by it, though as soon as i played more i warmed to the game and got use to the graphic detail in killing. All in all good game.

the game's idea is fun but when u play it over and over again u will get bored bec there is nothing will make u continue and the gameplay won't change same shi* every time nothing new but i hope some day this game get a huge change to make me and others to continue play this game

Preparate para adentrarte en un juego lleno de toxicidad y mancos, no creo que estes listo para esto. Pensalo 3 veces, después no hay vuelta atrás.

Mucho para decir de este juego en verdad, pero es preferible que lo experimentes por tu cuenta. Un juego espectacular que si bien es lo que dije antes, también es súper asqueroso y te genera un odio hacia la comunidad tremenda. Es supremamente adictivo y una vez que empezas, no podes parar, pero a medida que vas progresando y te vas encontrando gente mala, empezas a perder la cordura.

En rango rojo (4 para abajo) está lleno de gente malísima, verdaderamente es triste y desesperante ver como puede ser que haya gente que haya llegado a tal punto y no sepa apretar un botón del mouse o teclado para reparar un misero generador.

Algo que tambien hay que destacar es que tanto killers como survivors son casi igual de llorones y digo "casi iguales" porque los killers viven llorando 3 veces más y quejandose de las 3 mismas habilidades de siempre: Decisive Strike (Golpe Decisivo), Unbreakable (Irrompible) y Dead Hard (Traducido suena horrible).
Y se quejan como si no supieran que ellos tambien tienen todas las herramientas para ganarle a los supervivientes fácilmente.

En resumidas cuentas...
Juegazo, adictivo, estresante (a largo plazo), copado con amigos.

Compralo para jugar con amigos, no juegues solo como un papafrita.

Receta de chipá caseros
                  ✔1/2 taza de agua
                    ✔1/2 taza de leche
                     ✔1/4 de taza de aceite de maiz/girasol
                      ✔1 cucharada de sal
                       ✔1 taza de harina
                        ✔1 taza de fécula de mandioca (se pueden sustituir por fécula de maicena)
                         ✔1 huevo
                          ✔150 gramos de queso rallado

                            👉Los pasos a seguir son los siguientes
👉1. Primero pre calentás el horno a 180°.
👉2. Ponés a hervir el agua con la leche, la sal y el aceite. Apenas empiece a hervir apagás el fuego y añadis la fécula de una, se hace un engrudo tremendo pero vos seguí mezclando con una cuchara de madera.
👉3. Dejás que se enfrie un toque (podés pasar la mezcla a un bowl si querés hacerlo más rápido) y le agregás el huevo. Se va a hacer un quilombo de nuevo, pero vos mezclá.
👉4. Por último le añadís el queso, unis todo y untandote un poco de aceite en las manos, empezás a hacer las bolitas.
👉5. Podés hacerlas más grandes o más chiquitas.
👉6. Los ponés en una fuente para horno, dejando espacio entre ellos porque crecen, y los horneás durante unos 20 o 25 minutos, o hasta que los veas bien dorados.
👉7. Los dejás enfriar un toque (sí podés) y listo, a disfrutar de la receta de chipá caseros!

運営の脳みそがprettyなためゲーム内のバランスがまったくと言っていいほど取れていません
非対称の対戦ゲームなのに片方（サバイバー側）だけを優遇する調整ばかりします
サバイバーが不利になる調整は「検討する（笑）」といい放置するにもかかわらず
キラーが不利になる調整は即実装します
このような調整を重ねていった結果
キラー側の人口が減少しサバイバー側のマッチ時間は伸び
最終的に実力が見合っていないプレイヤー同士でのマッチングばかりになっています
という現状にもかかわらずキラーが不利になる調整をまたやろうとしています

A game with a lot of potential that is being damaged by needless changes and awful bugs.

- Developers keep releasing new DLC chapters instead of prioritizing critical flaws in the game
- There's a massive amount of hackers online both on survivor and killer side
- Major balance issues where survivors are more favored than killers
- Public IP exploits are present in the game and now we also have automated bot hackers
